ModMetaData.name: Silence of The Hams
ModMetaData.author: telgareith
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Announcing the Critically Acclaimed Silent Mod:[/h1] [h2][b]Silence of The Hams[/b][/h2]
Featuring award winning voice actors such as: [list] [*] The Golden Goose [*] Hare [*] Mother Goat [*] Donkey [*] Wicked Wolf [/list] And the piesta de resistance: [b]The Three Little Pigs[/b]
You don't have to hear them as they die- But you'll never forget the bed time stories, or the movie...
